Class BotContextImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.dauphine.robombastic.impl.BotContextImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BotContext, java.io.Serializable

    public class BotContextImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements BotContext, java.io.Serializable
    Context unique to each bot. A bot can interact with the game by using this class
    Author:
    Meyer
    See Also:
    BotContext, Serialized Form

      • infoTypes

        public java.util.Set<? extends java.lang.Class<? extends BotContext.Info>> infoTypes()
        Description copied from interface: BotContext
        Informations interfaces provided by the game to the bot. Theses classes can be used as argument of info(Class) to obtain an object implementing the interface. version 1 of the game required interfaces : CurrentBotInfo, and GeneralInfo.
        Specified by:
        infoTypes in interface BotContext
        Returns:
        a set of all interfaces provided by the game.
        See Also:
        BotContext.info(Class)

      • nextTurn

        public <R extends BotContext.ActionResponse,A extends BotContext.Action<R>> R nextTurn(A action)
                                                                                throws DeadBotException
        Description copied from interface: BotContext
        Ask the game to execute an action by the current bot. This method blocks until the action is treated by the game.
        Specified by:
        nextTurn in interface BotContext
        Type Parameters:
        R - type of the response corresponding to the action.
        A - type of the action.
        Parameters:
        action - to performs, this action may be null if the bot just want to wait until the next game turn.
        Returns:
        a response to the requested action.
        Throws:
        DeadBotException - if the current bot is dead.
        See Also:
        CurrentBotInfo.isAlive(), CurrentBotInfo#getTourTime()
